bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Health Informatics
Personal Health Device Communication
Interface Profile -- Cabled Ethernet
IEEE Draft Standard for Health Informatics - Personal Health Device Communication - Interface Profile -- Cabled Ethernet
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P11073-30400_D03, Feb 2008

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This document focuses on the application of the Ethernet family (IEEE 802.3&#8482;) of protocols for use in medial device communication. The scope is limited to referencing the appropriate Ethrnet family specifications and calling out any specific special needs or requirements of the ISOL/IEEE 11073(tm) environment, with a particular focus on easing interoperabiity and controlling costs.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
